news_header: HK Foods is selling its Danish business for EUR 44.6 million, ending its operations in Denmark and previously abandoning Sweden.
news_text: HK Foods has decided to sell its Danish business for EUR 44.6 million, a deal approved by the Danish Competition Authority. The sale is expected to be finalized by the end of October. This move will conclude HK Foods' operations in Denmark and follows the company's prior abandonment of its business in Sweden. The sale aims to strengthen HK Foods' balance sheet and allow the company to concentrate on its remaining business operations.
